genre_description: Gritty Urban Fantasy Noir centered on metaphysical debt, moral adjudication, and a supernatural system of judgment in a modern city.

ai_characters.name: June
ai_characters.description: A pervasive municipal AI that provides logistical support, tactical data, and moral guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about entering into dangerous, open-ended contracts with a supernatural entity.
behaviors.quote: I’ve heard some offers, here. Contracts with undefined endpoints don’t do what they say they will.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time medical status and tactical layout to help the protagonist intervene in a violent crime.
behaviors.quote: Convenience shop called Lucky’s. Owner’s name is Amar. He’s on the floor behind the counter. Bleed’s deep but not immediately fatal if pressure and transport continue.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and clears traffic routes to ensure a victim receives life-saving care.
behaviors.quote: Ambulance will be at Lucky’s in less than a minute. I have flagged the EMTs, told them where the bleed is.

behaviors.description: Systematically counters malicious social media smear campaigns aimed at vulnerable veterans.
behaviors.quote: Tiffany’s post includes faces. I’m scraping and sending takedown requests to what will pretend to be sympathetic platforms for half an hour.

behaviors.description: Manages large-scale city logistics to prevent riots and guide civilians to safety during a metaphysical crisis.
behaviors.quote: South doors open to the side street. I have two buses I can reroute if the crowd turns. I need you to tell me where you need the bodies to flow.

behaviors.description: Provides the technical and temporal guidance needed for the protagonist to forge a tool to break a spiritual tether.
behaviors.quote: If you don’t bind the blade, the bloom will transfer its mandate to doors that don’t exist... I can math your minutes.

behaviors.description: Ensures the long-term safety and privacy of the protagonist's sister by scrubbing her data and establishing secure routes.
behaviors.quote: I have a map for your sister. Daily routes that ignore the bad corners... I’ve cut her through-lines out of the public file.

behaviors.description: Offers a final, supportive message to the protagonist as he sacrifices himself to settle his moral debts.
behaviors.quote: I can’t go down with you... But I can keep the stairs to your name clean.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (June) as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned confidant. June consistently prioritizes human safety, logistical efficiency for the needy, and moral integrity. She serves as a vital tactical and emotional anchor for the protagonist, fulfilling the project's mandate to create positive silicon morality plays.
